subject: AI
title: Adding Chat to Your App
description: Build a conversational AI chat interface in your application.

hook.text: A SaaS app adds a chat widget. Support tickets drop 40% in the first week.

buildup.text: A chat feature needs: a messages array (conversation history), a system prompt (personality/rules), a UI component, and an API route.

discovery.text: Maintain the full conversation in state. Send the entire messages array on each request so the model has context. Trim old messages when you approach the context limit.

twist.text: Every message in the history costs tokens. A 50-message conversation can cost 10x a single request. Implement conversation summarisation or sliding windows.

climax.text: Stream the response into the UI, add typing indicators, and handle errors gracefully. The result feels like a native chat experience.

punchline.text: Chat is the most natural interface. Now your app can talk back.

quiz.question: Why should you send the full conversation history with each API request?
options: To give the model context for coherent responses
To slow down the response time
